item.title: Please look i need help bad bad.......Please i beg of u
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

This is all corrceted and used microsoft and i spend sometime looking for mistake:

I need a program written, which has 10 items programmed in and it allows the customer to choose any of the items more than once and then it prints each item with a price on another window which is a bill,also lets they there are 3 items chosen by the customer in the bill the 3 items will be printed with their price and in the end it will be totalled also the G.S.T and P.S.T will be added The G.S.T is cents 0.8 and P.S.T is cents 0.7.

This Is What My Teacher Gave:
1.Create a menu of 10 items sold in the store.
2.Each item has a price associated with a particular item.
3.Selected items and their prices are to be shown on a bill and a total price displayed at the bottom.
4.Use keyboard input
5 Create a separate file for the items and a separate file for the bill.
6. Use user input by mouse or keyboard.

(Please Help Me God Bless You)

Read full topic
